name: COSTAIDprojectaudioplayer
0: ”Alexa open strategies against fake news audio player”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: strategies against fake news audio player
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is an audio player for podcast files produced in the framework of the COSTAID (Coping With Strategies Against Information Disorder) EU project. Users are able to select between the Guidelines and the Training Modules playlists and listen to the available audio files.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
